text:
Spiral Media (Magento eCommerce Developers) | Lincoln, United Kingdom | Full Time | ONSITE

We're going through a period of fast growth, and looking for a full-time, on-site PHP developer to join our team of devs working on new-builds and with existing clients.

We specialise in Magento, so looking for someone with Magento experience, or at least an interest in learning and working with the platform.

https://www.spiralmedia.co.uk

Contact: adam@spiralmedia.co.uk
